snippet.title: I Try & Play: Action Man: Operation Extreme (PS1) - Part 1/3
snippet.description:
What can I say? I played a demo of this game back in the days, it didn't seem all that bad, even if it got rather awful reviews. Even after playing through the first two levels, I still think it's okay. It's not good, but it's certainly not complete garbage. The car controls were a bit lose, but I actually somewhat enjoyed the action stealth mission stuff.

The voice acting and the story etc... blah

I know the game is just 6 levels, so I will try to finish this game up in 3 videos or so.

I never had an Action Man figure. I know someone who got an Action Man figure of themselves though. o.O

I did notice near the end of recording this video that there is a counter for how many collectibles I've found in the area I am in, so I probably won't spend as much time making sure I get them all the next time. That's a somewhat neat function if it wasn't so easy to find them all anyways, but I'm not going to complain. I wanna watch all those "power point" presentations afterwards, as I assume that's what the power points are for.

Bosses:
0:11:09
0:41:36
1:03:26
